pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bandit-Based Experiments and Policy Evaluation // Frequentist inference on adaptively generated data. The methods implemented are based on Zhan et al. (2021) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2106.02029 and Hadad et al. (2021) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1911.02768. For illustration, several functions for simulating non-contextual and contextual adaptive experiments using Thompson sampling are also supplied.
